text: I’m using the HubSpot VScode extension and im facing the issues that my regular html tags and such are no longer autoclosed. is anyone else experiencing the same and perhaps found a fix to this?

Have you made sure to <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/install-and-use-HubSpot-code-extension#add-hubl-file-associations|set your file associations> in the relevant workspace? That’s usually the suspect when tools like Emmet or automatic tag pairing aren’t working as expected.
